sourcesContent:
import { Box, Button, Flex, Grid, GridItem, Heading, Text, useDisclosure } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import Card from "components/card/Card"; import { HSeparator } from "components/separator/Separator"; import Spinner from "components/spinner/Spinner"; import moment from "moment"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { IoIosArrowBack } from "react-icons/io"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { getApi } from "services/api"; const View = () => { const param = useParams() const [data, setData] = useState() const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")) const [isLoding, setIsLoding] = useState(false) const fetchData = async () => { setIsLoding(true) let response = await getApi('api/phoneCall/view/', param.id) setData(response?.data); setIsLoding(false) } useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) return ( <> {isLoding ? : <> Call View page Sender {data?.senderName ? data?.senderName : ' - '} Recipient {data?.recipient ? data?.recipient : ' - '} Create to {data?.createByName ? data?.createByName : ' - '} Realeted To {data?.createBy ? "contact" : data?.createByLead && "lead"} Start Date {data?.startDate ? moment(data?.startDate).format('lll ') : ' - '} End Date {data?.endDate ? moment(data?.endDate).format('lll ') : ' - '} Timestamp {data?.timestamp ? moment(data?.timestamp).format('DD-MM-YYYY h:mma ') : ' - '} [{data?.timestamp ? moment(data?.timestamp).toNow() : ' - '}] Call Duration {data?.callDuration ? data?.callDuration : ' - '} Call Notes 
{data?.callNotes ? data?.callNotes : ' - '}
 } {/* */} ); }; export default View;
